sql.where:
1=1
AND B.OrderNo LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderNo},'%')
AND B.userID=#{userID}
AND B.SKUCode LIKE CONCAT('%',#{skuCode},'%')
AND B.SampleCode LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sampleCode},'%')
AND CONCAT(B.SizeCode,':',B.Size) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{size},'%')
AND CONCAT(B.ColorCode,':',B.Color) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{color},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(B.CreateTime,"%Y%m%d") >= #{createTimeStart}
AND B.TaggingAddress = #{taggingAddress}
AND #{createTimeEnd} >= DATE_FORMAT(B.CreateTime,"%Y%m%d")
AND DATE_FORMAT(B.scanTime,"%Y%m%d") = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y%m%d")

mapper.select: SELECT B.OrderNo, B.DetailNo, B.ColorCode, B.Color, B.SizeCode, B.Size, B.PatternDimensionCode, B.SampleCode, P.ItemBrand, B.ItemCode, B.Item, B.SKUCode, B.SKUCodeForShipping, B.TaggingAddress, P.BusinessUnit, B.ScanNum, N.OrderQty_Pcs, (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MIN(C.CreateTime),"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S") FROM T_Tagging C WHERE C.SkuCode=B.SkuCode AND C.OrderNo=B.OrderNo) CreateTimeStart, DATE_FORMAT(now(),"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S") CreateTimeEnd FROM T_Tagging B INNER JOIN T_PO_INFO P on P.OrderNo=B.OrderNo INNER JOIN T_ORDER_Detail N on N.OrderNo=B.OrderNo and N.SKUCode=B.SKUCode

SELECT B.DetailNo FROM T_Tagging B
limit 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (SELECT group_concat(I.ProductOrderNo separator '/') FROM T_DO_INFO I WHERE I.OrderNo=B.OrderNo) ProductOrderNo, B.OrderNo, B.ColorCode, CONCAT(B.ColorCode,':',B.Color) Color, B.SizeCode, CONCAT(B.SizeCode,':',B.Size) Size, B.PatternDimensionCode, B.SampleCode, B.ItemCode, B.Item, B.SKUCode, B.SKUCodeForShipping, P.BusinessUnit, N.OrderQty_Pcs, SUM(B.ScanNum) ScanNum, T.UserId, T.UserName FROM T_Tagging B INNER JOIN T_PO_INFO P on P.OrderNo=B.OrderNo INNER JOIN T_ORDER_Detail N on N.OrderNo=B.OrderNo and N.SKUCode=B.SKUCode LEFT join T_USER T on B.UserID=T.UserId
group by B.OrderNo, B.ColorCode, B.Color, B.SizeCode, B.Size, B.PatternDimensionCode, B.SampleCode, B.ItemCode, B.Item, B.SKUCode, B.SKUCodeForShipping, N.OrderQty_Pcs, P.BusinessUnit, T.UserId, T.UserName ) B order by B.OrderNo DESC limit #{startRecord},#{currentPageShowCounts}

SELECT (SELECT group_concat(I.ProductOrderNo separator '/') FROM T_DO_INFO I WHERE I.OrderNo=B.OrderNo) ProductOrderNo, B.OrderNo, B.ColorCode, CONCAT(B.ColorCode,':',B.Color) Color, B.SizeCode, CONCAT(B.SizeCode,':',B.Size) Size, B.PatternDimensionCode, B.SampleCode, B.ItemCode, B.Item, B.SKUCode, B.SKUCodeForShipping, N.OrderQty_Pcs, P.BusinessUnit, SUM(B.ScanNum) ScanNum, T.UserID, T.UserName FROM T_Tagging B INNER JOIN T_PO_INFO P on P.OrderNo=B.OrderNo INNER JOIN T_ORDER_Detail N on N.OrderNo=B.OrderNo and N.SKUCode=B.SKUCode LEFT JOIN T_USER T on B.UserID=T.UserID
group by B.OrderNo, B.ColorCode, B.Color, B.SizeCode, B.Size, B.PatternDimensionCode, B.SampleCode, B.ItemCode, B.Item, B.SKUCode, B.SKUCodeForShipping, N.OrderQty_Pcs, P.BusinessUnit, T.UserID, T.UserName

SELECT B.OrderNo, B.SkuCode, T.UserID, T.UserName FROM T_Tagging B INNER JOIN T_PO_INFO P on P.OrderNo=B.OrderNo LEFT JOIN T_USER T on B.UserID=T.UserID
group by B.OrderNo, B.SkuCode, T.UserID, T.UserName
mapper.insert: insert into T_TAGGING ( OrderNo ,DetailNo ,ColorCode ,Color ,SizeCode ,Size ,PatternDimensionCode ,SampleCode ,ItemCode ,Item ,SKUCode ,SKUCodeForShipping ,TaggingAddress ,ScanTime ,ScanNum ,ICCard ,UserID ,Creater ,CreateTime ) select D.OrderNo, D.DetailNo, D.ColorCode, D.Color, D.SizeCode, D.Size, D.PatternDimensionCode, D.SampleCode, D.ItemCode, D.Item, D.SKUCode, D.SKUCodeForShipping, #{taggingAddress}, #{scanTime}, #{scanNum}, #{iCCard}, #{creater}, #{creater}, #{createTime} from T_ORDER_DETAIL D where D.OrderNo=#{orderNo} AND D.SKUCode =#{skuCode} limit 1
